page.title: 05The Grange Residential Home
page.content: Mr.and Mrs.Hooper own the{Grange old {people's home.}It was already a home when they bought it.When it was first built it was the Rectory.It is a very large house with a big garden and is just next to the church and school. After they bought it they made lots of changes,re-decorated it and bought special chairs to help lower old people into the bath.Some residents have rooms of their own,some share.Old people go to live there because they are too old or ill to look after themselves.There are 26 old ladies and three men living there at the moment. There are 26 staff counting a few who live there.The residents come from Montford Bridge,Pontesbury,Westbury Halfway House,Ford,Yockleton,Hadnall, Shrewsbury,Manchester,London and Switzerland.
